name: Physics(1992)
description:
Physics(1992)
Hi there my name is sheel ratan gautam so the new game we made called Physics(1992) Is a game in which there is a wall made out of 342 block which are not connected you cand dump in to the wall and make it break and fall It is really satisfying to watch and also to increase performence and to give it an old and pixel art look just decresed the resolution to 120p (160x120) and set the ratio from 16:9 to 4:3 And it also comes with really realistic physics i tried to make it as realistic as possible if you encounter any bug pls leave a comment.
You can on the shadow by clicking U on your key board and you can restart the game by pressing Y you can walk by pressing WASD and jump using SPACE key.
Also at the starting you can see some lag because of the rendering and physics simulation you can also see your game fps the number is displayed at the upper-left corner.
( And Also consiter downloading shooter fps(Alpha) )
